amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to pay an award or bonus to any employee of the Office of Construction and Facilities in VA, specifically in the locations of Denver, Orlando, Las Vegas and New Orleans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to pay an award or bonus to any employee of the Office of Construction and Facilities in VA, specifically in the locations of Denver, Orlando, Las Vegas and New Orleans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
